review: It is ok, I need more time to get used to maneuvering it and there should be a disclaimer on apps you can't use unless you have a subscription but we can stream netflix, and prime tv some sports so it is far better than nothing, and less expensive than cable.
author: Heather

review: Wow! Great! I've been using this for months; it has turned my smart TV into a dumb TV. Using NetFlix and other apps is far faster than the smart TV firmware and the Chromecast (because of the on-board memory). Having a remote is more convenient as well. My Chromecast has been relegated to streaming vids from my computer to the TV (the only thing the Fire TV Stick doesn't do...yet, as far as I know). The remote is well designed and responsive.
author: A. GILBERT
